summary: In 2019, VA launched a 5-year pilot program to train veterans to work in high-tech fields. In 2022, we found VA didn’t follow leading practices for pilot design. Our new review found other weaknesses, such as no plan for evaluating how well the pilot worked. And although veterans reported problems via an online portal, VA doesn’t have a plan to review this feedback to improve...
title: Veterans Employment: VA Should Address Human Capital Needs and Other Issues in High-Tech Training
